mdRecord.dcterms:title: Salem Fire Fighters D Platoon, April 1973
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Salem Fire Fighters D Platoon, April 1973, the following people are in the photograph: the man in the bottom row third going left to right is Tommy Chisom, the man first from the right in the top row is Courtney "Corky" Old, Bill Forlins is in the top row second from the left, John Sloan is in the top row third from the left, Charlie Knapp is in the top row fourth from the left, Larry Hunt is in the bottom row furthest to the left, Jerry Cooper is in the bottom row second from the left, Charlie Campbell is in the bottom row fourth from the left.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
